Title: Provides an extension of time to complete construction for certain building projects due to the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Provides an additional twenty-seven months to complete construction for certain building projects due to the COVID-19 pandemic; provides for the calculation of abatement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing an extension of time to complete construction for certain building projects due to the COVID-19 pandemic
